name: AI Content Analysis & Enhancement Pipeline
description: 10-step AI-powered content generation and analysis pipeline using OpenAI. Generates multiple perspectives, summaries, and formats from a single topic.

params.prompt: Write a comprehensive overview about {{trigger.topic}} in approximately {{trigger.wordCount}} words.

inputs.prompt: Rewrite this in a creative, engaging style: {{step1_initial_content.text}}
inputs.systemPrompt: You are a creative writer who makes content engaging and memorable.

inputs.prompt: Create a professional executive summary of this content: {{step1_initial_content.text}}
inputs.systemPrompt: You are a business analyst who creates clear, professional summaries.

params.prompt:
Extract key information from this content as JSON: {{step1_initial_content.text}}

Provide: mainPoints (3-5 key points), sentiment (positive/neutral/negative), complexity (beginner/intermediate/advanced), targetAudience. Return only valid JSON.
Create compelling marketing copy about {{trigger.topic}} that would attract readers to learn more.
params.systemPrompt: You are a marketing copywriter who creates persuasive, action-oriented content.

inputs.prompt: Provide a detailed technical analysis of {{trigger.topic}}, including challenges, opportunities, and future outlook.
inputs.systemPrompt: You are a technical expert who provides deep, analytical insights.

inputs.prompt: Create 3 social media posts (Twitter/X style, under 280 chars each) about {{trigger.topic}}
inputs.systemPrompt: You are a social media manager creating viral, engaging content.

params.prompt: Generate 5 frequently asked questions and answers about {{trigger.topic}}

inputs.prompt: Extract 10 relevant keywords and 5 hashtags for content about {{trigger.topic}}. Format as: Keywords: ... | Hashtags: ...
inputs.systemPrompt: You are an SEO expert who identifies optimal keywords and tags.
